Class Pizza

java.lang.Object
projects.rupizzeria.rupizzeria.pizza.Pizza
Direct Known Subclasses:
BBQChicken, BuildYourOwn, Deluxe, Meatzza
public abstract class Pizza extends Object
Describes the pizza type.
Author:
Melissa Xuan
